message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects a fair starting point for both of us.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more balanced split. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats away at your share even further.
Bob, I understand you want a fair split, but your proposal wasn't taking the inflation into account.  This offer is a compromise, considering the money loses value quickly for me with each round.
